scripts.pre-release: yarn test && yarn build && cp package.json dist/ && npm publish --dist dist --access restricted --dry-run
scripts.re-link: cd dist && (yarn unlink || echo 'no package to unlink') && yarn link && cd .. && yarn link @algolia/json-stream-analyzer
scripts.pre-release-test: yarn pre-release && yarn re-link && jest --config jest.pre-release.config.js
scripts.release: yarn pre-release-test && yarn version && yarn publish --dist dist --access restricted
